EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: This is your Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Heart, Sky or Thorn. The rest of this tree's options will be determined by this choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: You follow the path of the Heart. Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following: +5 Fire, Light, Positive and Universal Spell Power, +50 Maximum Spell Points, +1 Epic bonus to all DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: You follow the path of the Sky. Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following: +5 Electric, Cold, Sonic and Universal Spell Power, +50 Maximum Spell Points, +1 Epic bonus to all DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: You follow the path of the Thorn. Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following: +5 Acid, Force, Poison and Universal Spell Power, +50 Maximum Spell Points, +1 Epic bonus to all DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Now Grow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose another aspect of nature to gain a minor affinity for. You cannot choose what you took in the first core again. This does NOT confer eligibility to abilities later in the tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain a minor affinity for Heart. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one: +3 Fire, Light, and Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain a minor affinity for Sky. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one: +3 Electric, Cold, and Sonic Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain a minor affinity for Thorn. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one: +3 Acid, Force, and Poison Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Weathering the Elements
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 15% absorption against Fire/Cold/Acid/Electric/Poison damage. Whenever you cast any protection from element spell it grants you 25 points per level instead of 12 with no level cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Regrowth
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When your spell points drop below 5% of max you immediate restore 500 Spell Points and gain Nature's Resurgence which increases your Spell Critical Multiplier by 5% for the duration of the quest. This can only occur once during the quest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Seeking Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] Reflex Saving Throws, +[2/4/6] Tumble, and +[2/4/6] Balance. Rank 3: If you are using a Quarterstaff, you gain +1 Damage and +5 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Well Weathered
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a Primal Spell based off your nature. Shares a cooldown with all Epic Strikes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Carrion Swarm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Target enemies and nearby enemies becomes swarmed by biting acidic and poisonous insects. Every 2 seconds they take 1d4+1 acid and 1d4+1 poison damage per 2 character levels for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Each stack also causes a -4 penalty to attack rolls and Armor class. Cost 8 Spell Points Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spring to Summer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: A burst of butterflies forms around the caster in a small radius applying a copy of rejuvenation cocoon to all allies. After several seconds the butterflies burst into flame causing 2d6 Fire Damage per character level to all nearby enemies, Reflex vs Evocation DC:20+Highest of INT/WIS/CHA for half damage. Cost 20 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Storm Catcher
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Target enemy is instantly struck by a bolt of lightning for 1d6+3 damage per level. Fortitude vs Evocation DC:20+Highest of INT/WIS/CHA for half damage. Target also becomes chilled to the bone for 8 seconds slowing their movement and reducing their reflex save by half your character level. They also taking 1d6 per 2 character level in Cold damage every two seconds. Cost 5 Spell Points Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Friend
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you sit to rest at a rest shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bat of Echoes
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Sonic Spell Power, +15% Sonic Absorption, +3 Listen

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bird of Wind
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Electric Spell Power, +1% Dodge, +3 Spot

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fox of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Fire Spell Power, +2 Damage with Sneak Attacks, +3 Move Silently

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frog of the Lake
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Cold Spell Power, +2 Magical Resistance Rating, +3 Jump

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spider of the Deeps
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Poison and Acid Spell Power, 15% Poison Absorption

EnhancementSelection.Name: Squirrel of Luck
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to Attack, Damage, and all Saving Throws

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Rejuvenation Cocoon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protects target with a shield of 150 Temporary Hit Points for 9 seconds. Heals 5d6 HP every 2 seconds while the shield persists. Cost: 12 Spell points Cooldown: 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Flowers in the Thorns
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stepping inside a Thorn Spikes or Entangle spell, whether hostile or friendly, heals you for 1d3 hit points every 5 seconds per character level of the spell's owner.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mantle of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a mantle of Destiny that matches your Nature.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Healing spells have a chance to apply a copy of Rejuvenation Cocoon to your target. Your Fire, Light, and Alignment spells have a chance to apply a blast of that damage type for an extra 1d6+6 per character level. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each effect can only occur once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

Stance.Name: Primal Mantle
Stance.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Healing spells have a chance to apply a copy of Rejuvenation Cocoon to your target. Your Fire, Light, and Alignment spells have a chance to apply a blast of that damage type for an extra 1d6+6 per character level. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each effect can only occur once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Cold, Electric, and Sonic spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6+6 damage per character of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

Stance.Name: Primal Mantle
Stance.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Cold, Electric, and Sonic spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6+6 damage per character of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Acid, Force, and Poison spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6+6 damage per character of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

Stance.Name: Primal Mantle
Stance.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Acid, Force, and Poison spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6+6 damage per character of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Choice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a powerful Primal spell.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reborn in Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: A swirl of fire surrounds you dealing 1d6 fire damage per character to enemies and healing allies for 1d6 per character level. Cost: 30 Spell Points Cooldown: 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shard Storm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a cloud of acidic poisonous shards that randomly strikes enemies within 15 meters. 6 strikes over 6 s Cost: 20 Spell Points Cooldown: 20

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thunder Snow
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sends forth a wide wave of freezing hail before you with a narrow blast of lightning at its center directly in front of the caster. The hail deals 1d6+4 cold damage per character level. The bolt of lightning strikes for 1d6+4 per character level. Cost: 20 Spell Points Cooldown: 20

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Thrive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 50 Spell Points. Epic strike abilities in this tree grants now have a 30% chance to grant a 25% Enhancement discount to all spells. Lasts 4 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spirit Boon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multi-selector

EnhancementSelection.Name: Body
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2] Primal bonus to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mind
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2] Primal bonus to Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Ever Green
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] Maximum Spell Points. Rank 3: Mantle of Nature now has a chance to grant 100 Temporary Spell Points for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Shared Mantle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summons and pets now also benefit from your Mantle of Nature. In additional your Spell Power values are now added to theirs. +3 Imbue Dice while your Mantle is active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Magic of the Old World
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose from +[1/2/3] Enchantment/Evocation/Conjuration or Transmutation DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchantment
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Enchantment DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: At it's Core - Upgrade Primal Spell
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upgrade your Primal Spell.

EnhancementSelection.Name: At Its Core - Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Doubles the damage of Thunder Snow which now also applies the slow effect of Storm Catcher, slowing movement and reducing all targets reflex saves by half your character level for the duration of the slow.

EnhancementSelection.Name: At Its Core - Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Doubles the damage of Reborn in Fire, and the ability now grants +25% uncapped Dodge for 4 seconds on use.

EnhancementSelection.Name: At Its Core - Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: Doubles the damage of Shard Storm and you gain Shard Reflection for 12 seconds which grants 25% of your max Hit Points as temporary Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Shielding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 Hit Points and +2 Magical Resistance Rating. Your summons, pets and hirelings gain 60% of your Max Hit Points and 30 Magical Resistance Rating instead. Summoned minions also gain +4 Reflex Saves and Evasion.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Evasion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain the Evasion Feat. Exclusive from other enhancements that grant this feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Reach
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Universal Spell Power and reduces the cost of the Enlarge Metamagic by [3/6/9] Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Blessing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you rest the spirit of a nature manifests as a unicorn and provides a blessing on your party that lasts until quest's end or you rest again, granting a +5% inspiration bonus to Max Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Improved Metamagics I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Meta Magic to improve.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Quicken Metamagic by [1/2/4] spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Improved Metamagics II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Meta Magic to improve.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Quicken Metamagic by [1/2/4] spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Ally
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain the ability to summon an elemental ally based on your nature.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart Flame Dryad
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates an elder dryad that casts fire, light, and healing spells. She remains rooted to her summoning point. Duration: 15 Seconds. Cooldown: 15 Seconds. Activation Cost: 50 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Storm Guard
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates a greater storm spirit to blast your foes with lightning and cold. Remains bound to their summoning spot. Duration: 15 Seconds. Cooldown: 15 Seconds. Activation Cost: 50 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Briar Patch
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates a greater thorn spirit which launches attacks of poison and acid at nearby enemies. Remains bound to their summoning spot. Duration: 15 Seconds. Cooldown: 15 Seconds. Activation Cost: 50 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Ancient Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mass Frog
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Up to six nearby enemies are turned into frogs. Each may avoid ribbiting on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs. DC (20 + Highest of Wis/Int/Cha modifier + Transmutation bonuses). Costs 60 Spell Points. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

DC.Name: Mass Frog
DC.Description: Up to six nearby enemies are turned into frogs. Each may avoid ribbiting on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs. DC (20 + Highest of Wis/Int/Cha modifier + Transmutation bonuses).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Greater Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Transform briefly into an ultimate form based on your nature. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: Become like a Summer Fire for 15 seconds and gain: Become ethereal to monsters (you can pass through them) 25% Action Boost to movement speed 25% Uncapped Dodge 100% Absorption to Fire and Light Deal 1d6 Fire damage per character level to enemies that are close to you, and heal you and your allies for 1d6 Positive every character level as well. Immunity to most forms of Crowd Control Cooldown: 5 minutes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky Rager
EnhancementSelection.Description: Become like a Raging Storm for 15 seconds and gain: Become ethereal to monsters (you can pass through them) 25% Action Boost to movement speed 60% Incorporeality 100% Absorption to Cold and Electric Deal 1d6 Cold damage per character level and apply a slow to all enemies near you every two seconds. A single random enemy will be struck every 3 seconds with a bolt of lightning for 1d6+6 Electric damage per character level and knock down for 4 seconds. No save. Immunity to most forms of Crowd Control Cooldown: 5 minutes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn Cloud
EnhancementSelection.Description: Become like a Cloud of Biting Insects for 15 seconds and gain: Become ethereal to monsters (you can pass through them) 25% Action Boost to movement speed 60% Incorporeality 100% Absorption to Poison and Acid Deal 1d2 Acid and 1d2 Poison damage per character level to enemies near you every two seconds. Enemies also have a 50% chance to become swarmed which causes confusion for 6 seconds. No save. Immunity to most forms of Crowd Control Cooldown: 5 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Improved Intensify Spell
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduces the cost of the Intensify Spell Metamagic by [2/4/6] Spell Points.
